column4: hey anybody know if there is a way to set documentroot in apache via commandline?
that is the only way i know of
do i restart apache after i edit the file?
yes or sudo service apache reload
now its telling me im forbidden
i set the docroot to my home folder,
ok, does your home folder have read permissions for all users?
you are running apache as root?
you will need to give apache permission to read your home directory, one way or another
did you try to access an actual file, not a directory index
